title: Develop Life-of-Mine Schedule
description: A long-term planning engineer develops a high-level life-of-mine (LOM) schedule to determine the sequence of mining and the overall project lifespan.

tasks.description: Define the ultimate pit shell or final stope designs from the strategic mine plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: The final mineable reserve shape is imported into the scheduling software.

tasks.description: Develop a logical mining sequence by creating pushbacks or phases that respect geotechnical constraints.
tasks.expected_outcome: A practical, high-level mining sequence is established.

tasks.description: Generate a LOM schedule that shows the tons and grade of ore and waste to be mined each year, and the resulting mine life.
tasks.expected_outcome: A year-by-year production schedule is created, showing a 20-year mine life.
